articles.description: Scientists investigated Covid death tolls in 81 countries, including the UK and US. They compared the difference between a person's age when they died with Covid to the average life expectancy.
articles.content:
More than 20million years of life have been lost prematurely due to Covid, a study claimed today.
Researchers estimate the disease shaved 16 years off the lives of every coronavirus victim, on avera… [+6751 chars]
